trans-unit.source: The list of updates applied to Guest OS releases
trans-unit.target: The list of updates applied to Guest OS releases

trans-unit.source: The following tables show the Microsoft Security Response Center (MSRC) updates applied to the Azure Guest OS.
trans-unit.target: The following tables show the Microsoft Security Response Center (MSRC) updates applied to the Azure Guest OS.

trans-unit.source: Search this article to determine if a particular update applies to the Guest OS you are using.
trans-unit.target: Search this article to determine if a particular update applies to the Guest OS you are using.

trans-unit.source: Updates always carry forward for the particular <link><linkText>family[family-explain]</linkText><title></title></link> they were introduced in.
trans-unit.target: Updates always carry forward for the particular <link><linkText>family[family-explain]</linkText><title></title></link> they were introduced in.
